title: How can I turn all notifications to vibrate only, no sound on a Pixel 4?
content: The phone seems to give me options of completely silent or vibrate with sound, but not just vibrate. I have looked through all the settings and articles, and it won’t find it. I have tried going from individual apps, but the options are the same. I don’t want Do Not Disturb- I want to be disturbed, just not as annoyingly!
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4
